DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect pre-injection lidocaine myoclonus induce induction etomidate general anesthesia elderly patient
DOC.brief_title: Effect Pre-injection Lidocaine Myoclonus Induced Induction With Etomidate Elderly Patients During General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 60 81 year 2 . Body mass index : 20 30 kg/m2 3 . American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) Physical Status : Ⅰ Ⅱ 4 . Signed informed consent form 1 . Use sedative opioids 2 . History central nervous system disease , like epilepsy , shake palsy , chorea , etc 3 . Hyperthyroidism 4 . Serious diabetes 5 . Hyperkalemia 6 . Cardiac surgery 7 . Serious ventricular disease atrioventricular block 8 . Liver renal dysfunction 9 . Allergies amide local anesthetic fat emulsion
